channel.title: Hey, I'm Daryl from Docamatic
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I'm Daryl from Belfast in Northern Ireland. I'm a dad, developer and the bootstrapped founder of [docamatic.com](https://docamatic.com/).
Recently discovered the podcast and have been enjoying a serious binge of episodes!
Looking forward to participating in this community.
Cheers Daryl

item.title: Hey, I'm Daryl from Docamatic
item.dc:creator: daryl
item.description:
Thanks! I’m glad you enjoyed it when you were here. Not quite Barcelona, but we have the craic

item.title: Hey, I'm Daryl from Docamatic
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Welcome Daryl!

On a note completely unrelated to bootstrapping: Some years ago, I spent a few days in Belfast, and enjoyed it way more than I expected.
